Registration of Persons Act, No. 388 of 1968
AN AC? 70 PROVIDE FOR THE REGISTRATION OF CERTAIN
PERSONS WHO ARE IN CEYLON, FOR THE ISSUE OF
IDENTITY CARDS TO THE PERSONS 60 REGISTERED,
AND FOR PURPOSES CONNECTED THEREWITH OR
INCIDENTAL THERETO.
